entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inuvik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inuvik Airport 9:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -37.5°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
